function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential airborne transmission of TB in a clinical setting.","Impact":"Risk of TB infection to healthcare workers and patients.","Mitigation":"Implementation of upper-room UV light or negative air ionization as control measures.","Technologies":"Upper-room UV light, negative air ionization.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control teams."}]}
